sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog
            :value="visible"
            width="500"
            persistent
    >
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title
                    class="headline grey lighten-2"
                    primary-title
            >
                Invite user
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn icon flat @click="cancel">
                    <v-icon>close</v-icon>
                </v-btn>
            </v-card-title>

            <v-card-text>
                <v-text-field label="User id" v-model="userId"></v-text-field>
                <v-text-field label="Optional message" v-model="text"></v-text-field>
            </v-card-text>

            <v-divider></v-divider>

            <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn
                        color="primary"
                        flat
                        @click="invite"
                >
                    Invite
                </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
    import {mapActions, mapGetters} from 'vuex';

    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                userId      : null,
                text: null
            }
        },
        props  : {
            visible: {
                type   : Boolean,
                default: false
            }
        },
        methods: {
            invite() {
                this.$emit('invite', {userId: this.userId, text: this.text});
            },
            cancel() {
                this.$emit('cancel');
            }
        },
        watch  : {
            async visible(newValue) {
                if (!newValue) {
                    return;
                }
                this.name = null;
            }
        }
    }
</script>
